name: Ibexian
description: The Ibexian is a large fiend that embodies chaotic evil, characterized by its impressive speed and resilience. It boasts fiery attacks and excels in close combat, with a menacing presence and horned physique.
memorable: Its ability to unleash fire upon taking damage and deal heavy fire damage with charge attacks makes it a dangerous foe.
goals: To engage in combat and inflict chaos and destruction using its fiery powers.
relations: May be found in the company of other chaotic fiends or evil creatures.
environment: Often found in hellish or chaotic realms.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison damage, resistance to several elemental types, and high mobility.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magic attacks, with low intelligence and charisma, making it susceptible to strategic maneuvers.
attacks: Can perform multiattack with ram and hooves combining bludgeoning and fire damage, along with explosive fire with its spit fire.
most_powerful_ability: Pyroclasm allows it to unleash a devastating area of fire damage while moving through enemies.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 15, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, providing a reasonable degree of awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Deals additional fire damage upon taking damage (Fiery Blood).
Gains advantage on attacks when allies are nearby (Pack Tactics).
Can push targets back and knock them prone with Fiery Charge.
Combines bludgeoning and fire damage in its physical attacks.
Capable of significant area damage with Pyroclasm.
